function sendtocontroller(fname, sname, email, phone, enquiry, country, url, nature, sub) {
data: { txtFirstName: fname, txtSurname: sname, txtEmail: email, txtPhone: phone, txtEnquiry: enquiry, Country: country, pageurl: url, Nature: nature, subscribe: sub, sitename: "CSIRO.au: "},
